channel.title: Star of the Day

item.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
item.description: 9-1-1: Lone Star is an American procedural drama television series that follows the lives of Austin, Texas's first responders. It was created for Fox by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, and Tim Minear. The series is a spin-off of the American procedural drama television series 9-1-1, and was ordered by Fox in May 2019. The series premiered on January 19, 2020. Fox renewed the show for a fourth season in May 2022, which premiered on January 24, 2023. In May 2023, the series was renewed for a fifth season as a final season, with the premiere delayed until September 23, 2024, due to the 2023 SAG-AFTRA strike. The series will end with its fifth season.
